name: OPRoS Distribution Package 1.0
short_description:
Open Platform for Robotic Services (OPRoS) is a robot software platform including IDE and simulator. It works in Windows, Linux, and experimentally it was tested in Android, iOS, Embedded Windows, Embedded Linux, QNX, Xenomai. 

These distribution packages have OPRoS Execution Engines and eclipsed based IDE including example components prior to 2013.

*Prerequisite Programs: Oracle JAVA SDK 6.0 above, VS 2008/2010 redistribution packages (for Window users)

* Prior to 2012: tested in VS2008 with boost library and eclipse Helios with OPRoS IDE plugins

* 2012-2013: tested in VS2010 without boost library and eclipse Indigo with OPRoS IDE plugins
- OPRoS_Avalone_v1.exe
- 2012OPRoSRobotContest_0815.exe has OPRoS ED simulator instead of OPRoS Simlab simulator.
- OPRoS_Win32_Indigo_Rev.exe has installed OPRoS Simlab simulator.

* 2013-present: OPRoS2.0 with eclipse RCP of OPRoS IDE
summary: OPRoS Execution Engine and IDE prior to 2013
